name: RoundTablePizza
0:
”Alexa, open Round Table.”
”Alexa, play Round Table.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: round table
des:
Round Table is pizza royalty. So it’s only fitting that you announce the arrival of your pizza with this official royal fanfare! 

When the delivery person rings your doorbell, tell Alexa to "Open Round Table." That way, everyone in your castle (and maybe some neighbors) will know that Round Table Pizza has arrived! (It doesn't hurt to bow or curtsy, either.) 

Is a family member bringing home Round Table for dinner? Give them the royal treatment by playing our trumpets as they walk through the front door. It’s just another reminder that when it comes to pizza, Round Table rules!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
